Use this data source to get details of the specified IAM user group.

> You *must* have IAM read privileges to use this data source.


<div><pulumi-examples>

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/huaweicloud/pulumi-huaweicloud/sdk/go/huaweicloud/Iam"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-huaweicloud/sdk/go/huaweicloud/Iam"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := Iam.GetGroup(ctx, &iam.GetGroupArgs{
			Name: pulumi.StringRef("my_group"),
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

## Using getGroup {#using}

Two invocation forms are available. The direct form accepts plain
arguments and either blocks until the result value is available, or
returns a Promise-wrapped result. The output form accepts
Input-wrapped arguments and returns an Output-wrapped result.

        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the whether the IAM user is enabled.</p>

    </dt>

            title="Required">
        <span id="passwordexpiresat_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#passwordexpiresat_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Password<wbr>Expires<wbr>At</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the time when the password will expire.
Null indicates that the password has unlimited validity.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="passwordstatus_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#passwordstatus_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Password<wbr>Status</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the password status. True means that the password needs to be changed,
and false means that the password is normal.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="passwordstrength_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#passwordstrength_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Password<wbr>Strength</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the password strength. The value can be high, mid, or low.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

            title="Required">
        <span id="password_strength_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#password_strength_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">password_<wbr>strength</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the password strength. The value can be high, mid, or low.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="description_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the description of the identity group.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="enabled_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the whether the IAM user is enabled.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="id_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the ID of the identity group.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="name_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the name of the identity group.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="passwordexpiresat_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#passwordexpiresat_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">password<wbr>Expires<wbr>At</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the time when the password will expire.
Null indicates that the password has unlimited validity.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="passwordstatus_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#passwordstatus_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">password<wbr>Status</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the password status. True means that the password needs to be changed,
and false means that the password is normal.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="passwordstrength_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#passwordstrength_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">password<wbr>Strength</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Indicates the password strength. The value can be high, mid, or low.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
